snippet: Sadakat Kadri’s history of Islamic law tries to dispel the myths surrounding Shariah and discusses how fundamentalists appropriate it for their own purposes.
abstract: Dwight Garner reviews book Heaven on Earth: A Journey Through Shari'a Law From the Deserts of Ancient Arabia to the Streets of the Modern Muslim World by Sadakat Kadri.
lead_paragraph: Sadakat Kadri’s history of Islamic law tries to dispel the myths surrounding Shariah and discusses how fundamentalists appropriate it for their own purposes.

headline.main: Defending Muslim Law From Those Invoking It
